content:
CustomPeerResolverService Class

Definition

Provides a basic implementation of a custom peer resolver service.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("PeerChannel feature is obsolete and will be removed in the future.", false)]
[System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehavior(ConcurrencyMode=System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode.Multiple, InstanceContextMode=System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode.Single, UseSynchronizationContext=false)]
public class CustomPeerResolverService : System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract
Inheritance
Object
CustomPeerResolverService

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The CustomPeerResolverService class defines the base implementation of a custom peer resolver service and provides lookup for the resolution of registration IDs to peer endpoint addresses within the mesh maintained by this resolver.

Constructors

CustomPeerResolverService()

Initializes a new default instance of the CustomPeerResolverService class.

public CustomPeerResolverService ();

Properties

CleanupInterval

Gets or sets the recurring length of time after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

public TimeSpan CleanupInterval { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

TimeSpan that specifies the time interval after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

Exceptions
ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The interval is either zero or greater than MaxValue.

InvalidOperationException

An attempt to set the property was made after a call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

Remarks

This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero. The default interval is 1 minute.

This value must be less than the value of RefreshInterval to avoid the occurrence of stale entries in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

ControlShape

Gets or sets whether referrals are shared by the peer resolver service.

public bool ControlShape { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

True if referrals are shared by the peer resolver service; false if they are not.

RefreshInterval

Gets or sets the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

public TimeSpan RefreshInterval { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

TimeSpan that specifies the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

Exceptions
ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The interval is either zero or greater than MaxValue.

InvalidOperationException

An attempt to set the property was made after a call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

Remarks

This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero. The default interval is 2 minutes.

When the amount of time supplied to this property has passed for a given entry in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table, that entry is marked for deletion. The delete occurs when interval specified in the CleanupInterval property occurs. For example, if this property is set to a timespan of 10 minutes, entries in the registration lookup table will become stale and marked for deletion after the interval has passed. As a result, the peer resolver client must update every ten minutes to avoid having their entry deleted.

Methods

Close()

Closes the peer resolver service.

public virtual void Close ();
Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The service has been closed by a previous call to this method.

GetServiceSettings()

Obtains the specific response settings for the peer resolver service.

public virtual System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo GetServiceSettings ();
Returns
ServiceSettingsResponseInfo

ServiceSettingsResponseInfo that contains the specific response settings for the custom peer resolver service, including cleanup and refresh interval settings.

Open()

Opens the peer resolver service.

public virtual void Open ();
Exceptions
ArgumentException

stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval* or stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.RefreshInterval* are set to a time span interval of 0.

InvalidOperationException

The service has been started by a previous call to this method.

Remarks

When this method is called, it schedules the first registration lookup table cleanup based on the value set for the CleanupInterval property.

Refresh(RefreshInfo)

Refreshes the expiry of an entry in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

public virtual System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshResponseInfo Refresh (System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo refreshInfo);
Parameters
refreshInfo
RefreshInfo

RefreshInfo object that contains the mesh ID and the registration ID of the entry to refresh in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

Returns
RefreshResponseInfo

RefreshResponseInfo that contains the newly refreshed registration entry.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

refreshInfo is set to null.

InvalidOperationException

The custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

Remarks

A refresh of an entry extends the length of time for which it remains valid. All information used to uniquely identify the entry must be supplied in the RefreshInfo object supplied to this method.

Register(RegisterInfo)

Adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.

public virtual System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo Register (System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo registerInfo);
Parameters
registerInfo
RegisterInfo

RegisterInfo that contains information about the registration entry to register with the peer resolver service.

Returns
RegisterResponseInfo

RegisterResponseInfo that contains a copy of the entry added to the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

ArgumentException

The RegisterInfo object supplied to this method was either null or not correctly formed.

NullReferenceException

The AddressInfo property of the object supplied to the registerInfo parameter was null.

ArgumentNullException

The meshId value supplied to this method is set to null.

Remarks

This method adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service. Note that registrations made after the service is closed have no effect -- these entries are not returned by resolve requests.

Register(Guid, String, PeerNodeAddress)

Adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.

public virtual System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo Register (Guid clientId, string meshId, System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress address);
Parameters
clientId
Guid

A Guid that specifies a unique identifier for the registration entry to register with the resolver service.

meshId
String

A String that specifies the mesh ID of the peer mesh in which the registration entry participates.

address
PeerNodeAddress

A PeerNodeAddress that contains the endpoint address of the registration entry.

Returns
RegisterResponseInfo

A RegisterResponseInfo that contains a copy of the entry added to the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

ArgumentException

The RegisterInfo object supplied to this method was either null or not correctly formed.

ArgumentNullException

The MeshId and/or the RegistrationId property of object supplied to the refreshInfo parameter was null.

NullReferenceException

The MeshId property of the object supplied to the refreshInfo parameter is unknown.

Resolve(ResolveInfo)

Returns a list of known endpoints for a registration entry.

public virtual System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo Resolve (System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo resolveInfo);
Parameters
resolveInfo
ResolveInfo

ResolveInfo that contains information on the registration entry for which endpoints, if known, are to be looked up by the peer resolver service.

Returns
ResolveResponseInfo

ResolveResponseInfo that contains the endpoints for the registration entry in the lookup table that matches the information supplied in the resolveInfo parameter.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

The ResolveInfo object is null or is not correctly formed.

InvalidOperationException

A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

Remarks

This method looks up a registration entry based on the data supplied in a ResolveInfo object and returns any corresponding endpoint addresses found in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table. The number of endpoint addresses returned is equal to or less than the value of the MaxAddresses property set on the ResolveInfo object.

Unregister(UnregisterInfo)

Removes a specific entry from the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.

public virtual void Unregister (System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UnregisterInfo unregisterInfo);
Parameters
unregisterInfo
UnregisterInfo

UnregisterInfo that contains the information used to uniquely identify the registration entry to remove from the registration lookup table.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

An entry for the specified registration entry could not be found, or the supplied UnregisterInfo object is null or not correctly formed.

InvalidOperationException

A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.

Update(UpdateInfo)

Updates an existing registration entry entry in the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.

public virtual System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo Update (System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo updateInfo);
Parameters
updateInfo
UpdateInfo

UpdateInfo that uniquely identifies a specific registration entry and provides updated information for it.

Returns
RegisterResponseInfo

UpdateInfo that contains a copy of the updated registration entry entry.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

An entry for the specified registration entry could not be found, or the supplied UpdateInfo object was not correctly formed.

InvalidOperationException

A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to stem.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open*.
